document.full_text: pennsylvania game officials on tuesday approved a hunting season for porcupines -- spiky, slow-moving animals that have grown in number and angered residents who say they destroy property.
document.title: pennsylvania approves hunting porcupines
lines_and_colors: pennsylvania game officials on tuesday approved a hunting season for porcupines -- spiky, slow-moving animals that have grown in number and angered residents who say they destroy property.
